com.gpiskas.confextractor

Class ConfExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gpiskas.confextractor.ConfExtractor

  • public class ConfExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a collection of methods that are used to extract the permission configuration of any installed package.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static ConfExtractor instance 
      private static PackageManager pm 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      java.util.List<PermissionInfo> getAllPerms()
      Retrieve all permissions.
      java.util.Map<PackageInfo,java.util.List<PermissionInfo>> getGlobalPermsDefined()
      Retrieve the permission definitions per package, for all packages.

      Retrieve the permissions used per package, for all packages.

      Return a List of all packages that are installed on the device.

      Retrieve the permissions that have a normal protection level.

      Retrieve all of the known permission groups in the system.

      Retrieve the permissions held by all packages, grouped by permission groups.

      Retrieve all of the information we know about a particular permission.

      Retrieve the permissions that are defined by the specified package.

      Query for all of the permissions associated with a particular group.

      Retrieve the permissions that are used by the specified package.
      PackageInfo getPkgInfo(java.lang.String pkg)
      Retrieve overall information about an application package that is installed on the system.

      Return a List of all installed packages that are currently holding any of the given permissions.

      • getPermHoldersPerGroup

        public java.util.Map<PermissionGroupInfo,java.util.Map<PermissionInfo,java.util.List<PackageInfo>>> getPermHoldersPerGroup()
        Retrieve the permissions held by all packages, grouped by permission groups. Permissions that do not belong to a group will not be included.
